About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I haven't got any experience yet, but as of now I've been learning technology that will help me to put my career to Web Development. I have been putting half of my days to learn things that I want to learn and the things I could use for my future job. I sometimes forget to eat just to modify some codes in my project that I've been working. I got to tell you man, it isn't easy for me to do this kind of things 'cause I used be lazy and addictive playing games and you know, going out with friends. It's just now, it just kicks me. I used to doubt myself. I was skeptical to anything. I will not promise anythings because "promise" means nothing to me. So, I'll just put an end to this and I'll work something out to feel myself great.

Centro Escolar University

Student

"Mabuhay ka, mahal namin pamantansan" that is our CEU Hymn, we used to sing that together with my blockmates and we were just so happy singing it and we didn't care at all about anything around us.

Step Asia Inc.

Intern

In Step Asia, the people in there are not good, their environment was so fucked up. I regret deciding to stay in that place. I hope they improve and become organized about their work.

Webworks

Graphic Designer
